usefulItems: baking tray (30 x 40 cm), baking paper, wire rack, sealable container, oven
title: Gluten and Grain Free Bread Rolls

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray (30 cm x 40 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Place raw almonds and psyllium husks in mixing bowl then mill <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add baking powder and salt then combine <b>Turbo/0.5 sec/4 times<b>.
Add egg whites and vinegar then knead <b>20 sec/<b>.
Add boiling hot water and knead <b>1 min/<b>. Dough will be sticky but workable with spatula.
Divide dough into 5 equal-sized pieces, form into rolls and place on prepared baking tray. Bake for 50-55 minutes (180°C), until lightly golden.

Allow to cool on tray for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack. Serve warm or allow to cool completely (approx. 20 minutes) before transferring to a sealable storage container until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: To ensure gluten free recipes are gluten free, always read the labels of your products carefully to ensure traces of wheat or gluten have not been used as part of the production process.
This recipe will work in a fan oven, but the rolls will not rise as much. A conventional oven setting is recommended.
